text: While Holoscan has benchmarks, ensuring predictable real-time behavior requires deeper timing analysis. Dr. Arpan Gujarati's research group previously published work on statically analyzing CPU-based systems, developing an algorithmic approach to determine maximum end-to-end time given worst-case response times (WCRTs) of individual nodes in the application graph. In 2024-2025, this analysis was improved, and got accepted at RTSS 2025.
articleTitle: Predictable GPU Scheduling for Real-Time Edge AI
